mapper.select: select a.* from tb_menu a JOIN tb_role_menu b on a.menu_id = b.mid join tb_role c on b.rid = c.rid join tb_user d on c.rid = d.rid where d.username = #{value}
select b.id from tb_menu a join tb_button b on a.menu_id = b.mid where a.menu_id = #{menuId}
SELECT a.menu_name authenName, a.url url, IF(a.pid IS NULL, 1, 2) `level` FROM tb_menu a UNION ALL SELECT b.`name` authenName, c.url, 3 LEVEL FROM tb_button b JOIN tb_menu c ON b.mid = c.menu_id
